attributes.action: prosecute the Catholic church in the International Criminal Court for it's opposal to the use of condoms as a method of preventing HIV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The HIV virus is ravaging africa. Last year 2 million people died from AIDS in sub-saharan africa.
One of the major reasons for the spread of AIDS in this area is unprotected sex.
The catholic church has great influence in the area, and yet it continues to denounce the use of condoms.
The use of condoms in this region could greatly reduce the further spread of AIDS.
Millions of people have died because of the catholic church's actions, and millions more will in the future.
The blood of millions of people is on the hands of the catholic church, and they should answer for it.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
